revised_title: Projective Geometry and Conformally Flat Space-Times
tldr: The article presents a new geometric description of conformally flat space-times using projective geometry. It demonstrates how an arbitrary conformally flat metric can be defined by selecting a scalar field on a four-dimensional quadric hypersurface embedded in projective 5-space. The properties of Friedmann-Robertson-Walker cosmological models are derived as examples within this framework.
